underlying_goal: Fix Terraform apply 403 errors caused by depends_on deferred evaluation and related infrastructure issues, then commit and push changes via PRs
friction_detail: Docker image was initially pushed without --platform linux/amd64, causing a platform compatibility error on Cloud Run.
brief_summary: User asked Claude to implement a Terraform fix plan for 403 errors, then iteratively debugged additional IAM and Docker image issues across multiple PRs, with all issues resolved.
